topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55989c9e63687258a3000cbd#post_55989c9e63687258a3000cbd
[bq="Carcass Strife"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55989c00636872131a000531#post_55989c00636872131a000531
How bad?[/bq]
The specific type of bad is the rehashed story kind of bad, but not a complete rehash cause that would anger fans but the rehash kind of bad where they get rid of Lilo and replace her with a poor clone that is far less character wise developed so that the viewer can pretend it's Lilo kind of bad.

I'd rate it a 1/5.  Not vomit inducing bad, but still bad enough that you can't get through it sober.
